word: SATAN\92S PUNISHMENT COMMENSURATE WITH HIS GUILT.\97Satan also and his angels were judged by Jesus and the saints. Satan\92s punishment was to be far greater than that of those whom he had deceived. His suffering would so far exceed theirs as to bear no comparison with it. After all those whom he had deceived had perished, Satan was still to live and suffer on much longer.\97EW 291.
